name: Pokemon Zero Negative
description:
Disclaimer:

Pokemon is owned by Game Freak and Nintendo. Please support the official titles.

This is the very first game I "made" [modded] before discovering GB Studio, as such, there are so many bugs, and poorly optimized gameplay and story here.

This game is FREE, but please consider supporting me and my future projects by contributing to them or by following me here and on my game dev socials.

Story:

 In an alt-universe, Red, before completing his Pokedex, suddenly disappeared. You are tasked to investigate the sudden change in climate, geology, and Red's case. Is it caused by the new evil gang after Team Rocket disbanded? Or is it a new type of Pokemon?

Features:
  • 65% Completable [Game abruptly ends in Lavander Town]
  • Familiar yet new story
  • A confusing new layout of Kanto
  • Harder challenges
  • New Starter line-up
  • New rivals
  • New Fakemon Legendary
  • New Evil Teams
  • New Gym Leaders and Elite Four
Known Bugs and Softlocks
  • SS Anne Captain's event will trap players in the pier. [Have a Pokemon with Teleport and use a PokeCenter before boarding!]
  • House by the gate to Saffron City will crash the game completely. [Avoid at all costs]
  • No cheat codes were tested in making this mod [Use cheat codes sparringly]
Yesterday's modders are tomorrow's game developers. Never stop dreaming.
